name: Water Blades
description:
A minimalistic game, for iOS and Android, that takes you over and adventure on the underwater world.

Ocean, Blades, Spikes and Explosions! Don’t let the ocean beat you!

Water Blades, Travel across the ocean, but watch out for the spikes, because they are not your friends and they will try to destroy you at any chance they get.

Escape… If you can
